column3: "DO YOU THINK AFFIRMATIVE ACTION IN HIRING AND PROMOTION IS A GOOD POLICY FOR PRIVATE INDUSTRY?  WILL IT ACCOMPLISH THE GOVERNMENT'S GOALS? CAN YOU DISTINGUISH BETWEEN AFFIRMATIVE ACTION AND A QUOTA SYSTEM?"

column3: "PLEASE DISCUSS AIR POLLUTION.  FIND OUT WHAT SUBSTANCES THE OTHER CALLER THINKS CONTRIBUTE THE MOST TO AIR POLLUTION TODAY.  WHAT CAN INDIVIDUALS OR SOCIETY DO TO IMPROVE AIR QUALITY?"

"WHAT WAS THE LAST AUTO REPAIR YOU PERFORMED OR HAD DONE ON YOUR CAR? ARE THERE SOME TYPES OF REPAIRS OR MAINTENANCE TASKS YOU PREFER TO DO YOURSELF?  DISCUSS YOUR EXPERIENCES IN THIS AREA WITH THE OTHER CALLER."
